UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the CollectPro application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

role.description: The user's role within the system (e.g., Agent, Supervisor, Admin).

themeMode.description: The user's preferred theme mode (light or dark).

team_id.description: The ID of the team the user belongs to.

team_name.description: The name of the team the user belongs to.

Team.title: Team
Team.description: Represents a team of agents and a supervisor within an organization.

org_id.description: Identifier for the organization this team belongs to.

description.description: A brief description of the team's purpose.

leader_id.description: The user ID of the team leader (supervisor).

leader_name.description: The name of the team leader.

members.description: An array of objects representing the team members (agents).

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign assigned to this team.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the team was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the team was last updated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the notification preferences.

emailAlertsEnabled.description: Indicates whether email alerts are enabled.

smsAlertsEnabled.description: Indicates whether SMS alerts are enabled.

inAppNotificationsEnabled.description: Indicates whether in-app notifications are enabled.

id.description: Unique identifier for the system configuration.

callTimeout.description: The call timeout duration in seconds.

maxConcurrentCalls.description: The maximum number of concurrent calls allowed.

recordingEnabled.description: Indicates whether call recording is enabled.

CallDisposition.title: CallDisposition
CallDisposition.description: Represents the outcome of a single call.

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent who handled the call.

lead_id.description: The ID of the lead that was called.

disposition_type.description: The selected outcome category for the call.

disposition_notes.description: Optional notes from the agent about the call.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the disposition was logged.

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign this call was part of.

outcome_score.description: A numeric score representing the call outcome for analytics.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability for the CollectPro application's features. User profiles and notification preferences are stored under the `/users/{userId}` path, providing path-based ownership. A new `/teams` collection is added to store team information, which can be managed by Admins. System-wide configurations are in a separate `/system_configurations` collection, accessible only to admins. Roles are managed via document existence in `/roles_admin/{userId}`. A new `call_dispositions` collection is added to log call outcomes; security rules will enforce that agents can only create dispositions for their own calls.
